derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: probably a variant of the noun shred. The early sense was 'fragment cut from a main piece', then 'torn strip, tatter', whence (via the notion of a long roll or list) sense 1

means.word_mean: 3. an accurately levelled strip of material placed on a wall or floor as guide for the even application of plaster or concrete
